document_data.name: Thauvas Zlorn
document_data.deathnotes: Suicide attack while controlled by [[Elminster Aumar]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Thauvas Zlorn''', also known as '''Khornadar of Westgate''', was a [[Red Wizard]] of [[Thay]] active during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was a liaison with the [[Rightful Conspiracy]] of [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Description: In his disguise as Khornadar, he was tall, with a thin spike-shaped beard.
document_data.Abilities: He was capable of using [[magic]] to disguise himself, and claimed to have a ward against being magically eavesdropped on, which included some of his surroundings. One of his [[spell]]s allowed him to sift the thoughts of other people near him. Another of his spells was an offensive flame of some kind.
document_data.Relationships: He was a fellow of [[Naerzil]], and served another, unseen mage.
